food.details: All types of beans and legumes like baked beans, green beans, couscous and lentils.
Different types of breads and cereals like bagels, wraps, rye, wheat bread and oatmeal
Cheese varieties and dairy products like cheddar, mozzarella, gouda, skim milk and yoghurt.
Hot and cold drinks like juices, soft drinks, smoothies, coffee, beer, wine and cocktails.
Variety of plain and cooked eggs like, egg whites, hard-boiled, scrambled, fried and poached.
Foods from all your favorite chains like burgers, chips, pizza, hot dogs, sandwiches and burritos.
A range of seafood and fish like tuna, salmon, cod, prawns, lobster, scallops and oysters.
Popular fruits like apples, bananas, strawberries, oranges, grapes, peaches, pears and grapefruit
Full range of meats and cuts like bacon, ribs, chicken breast, pork chops, corned beef and roast turkey.
Popular nuts and seeds like almonds, peanuts, pecans, pistachios, walnuts and sunflower seeds.
All types of pasta and rice like spaghetti, macaroni, ravioli, lasagna, white rice and fried rice.
All your favorite salads like coleslaw, potato salad caesar salad, egg salad and chicken salad
All types of sauces and spices like tomato sauce, pasta sauce, salsa, olive oil, mayo, salad dressing, hummus, mustard and maple syrup.
Sweet and salty snacks like potato chips, corn chips, popcorn, pretzels, crackers, granola bars and rice cakes.
All types of soups like chicken, noodle, vegetable and chunky as well as bisques, chowders, stews and broths.
Sweet treats like lollies, chocolate, cake, donuts, ice cream, pastries, muffins, pancakes and biscuits.
All vegetables like mushrooms, carrots, potatoes, tomatoes, broccoli, lettuce, peas and onions.
Popular foods like dumplings, croutons, chow mein, french toast, quiche, spring rolls and grits.
